post:
Up for grabs are 16 sticks of 8GB DDR3 PC-10600 Hynix Server memory.  This is HP branded.  All memory is brand new and unused, but was bought in bulk meaning that each still will only come in an anti-static bag and packed accordingly.  Please contact me if you are interested in buying more than 2 sticks or the whole lot of 16, as I would be willing to consider a hefty discount if you were to buy them all at once.

RAM will be packed in anti-static bag with plenty of padding in a USPS Flat Rate Small Box.  I will get this out the next day after paying, possibly the same day depending when it's paid.  Please ensure this will work for your specific application before ordering, as I won't accept a return for that reason.

Looking to get $75/stick, contact me if you are interested in the whole lot as I will let them go at a much discounted rate.  I am located in Alaska, USA, I would consider shipping internationally if the quantity is right (I won't ship one stick internationally, as it's kind of a hassle, sorry)

I have received permission from a moderator to post this offer.

Edit:

Specifications

* Mfr Part Number: HMT31GR7BFR4C-H9D7
* Type: DDR3
* Capacity: 8 GB
* Speed: PC10600 1333MHz
* Size & Bit: 512M x 4
* Pins: 240pin
* ECC: Yes
* Registered: Yes
* Chip: Hynix
* Rank: 2
* CL 9
